description: Object identifier or name
name: objectId

description: Candidate ID from operations DB
name: candid

description: Right Ascension of candidate; J2000 [deg]
name: ra__alert_avros

description: Declination of candidate; J2000 [deg]
name: dec__alert_avros

description: Name of the survey's Kafka topic that originated the alert.
name: kafka_topic__alerts_raw

description: Timestamp of the original alert from the survey's Kafka topic.
name: kafka_timestamp__alerts_raw

description: Timestamp of the alerts_raw Pub/Sub message.
name: publish_time__alerts_raw

description: Message ID of the alerts_raw Pub/Sub message.
name: message_id__alerts_raw

description: Timestamp of the alerts Pub/Sub message.
name: publish_time__alerts

description: Timestamp of the BigQuery Pub/Sub message.
name: publish_time__BigQuery

description: BigQuery alerts table Id the alert was stored in.
name: alerts_table__BigQuery

description: BigQuery DIASource table Id the alert was stored in.
name: DIASource_table__BigQuery

description: Timestamp of the alert_avros Pub/Sub message.
name: publish_time__alert_avros

description: Name of the bucket that contains the alert avro file.
name: bucketId__alert_avros

description: Name of the alert avro file in the bucket.
name: filename__alert_avros

description: Type of event that triggered the alert_avros Pub/Sub message; e.g., OBJECT_FINALIZE or OBJECT_METADATA_UPDATE.
name: eventType__alert_avros

description: Timestamp of the event (e.g., file upload) that triggered the alert_avros Pub/Sub message.
name: eventTime__alert_avros

description: Timestamp of the Lite Pub/Sub message.
name: publish_time__lite

description: Timestamp of the Tagged Pub/Sub message.
name: publish_time__tagged

description: Timestamp of the SuperNNova Pub/Sub message.
name: publish_time__SuperNNova
